participant_1.background:
I don't like fast food, but I love a good cup of chai tea.
i am a gourmet cook.
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
i practice yoga daily.

participant_2.background:
I do not play an instrument, but I love to sing along to country music with my fiancé on the weekends.
I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.
I enjoy tinkering with my car, working on it in the garage and fixing it up.
my mother is a teacher in the city.
i am an animal rights activist.

content.text: Hello! I love chai tea. What about you?
Hello! I have never actually tried chai tea, what's it like?
It's a black tea with spices like cinnamon and ginger. It's really delicious!
Oh that sounds interesting! I might have to try it sometime.
I highly recommend it! It's especially good when it's cold out.
I love trying new things, so I'll definitely give it a try.
Great! I hope you like it!
Me too! Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! What are you doing this weekend?
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure your kids will love it.
I hope so! I love spending time with them.
That's great! I love spending time with my kids too.
